attributes.action: allow Ukrainian citizens to travel to the UK without needing a visa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I find it strange that in September 2005 the Ukrainian government announced that citizens from the UK and certain other EU countries don't need a visa to travel to Ukraine, but, if a Ukrainian citizen wants to come over here they do. I think it is only fair that our government follows that of the Ukraine, after all, why can't one country do the same as the other?
